pl.marcinmazur.portfolio.service

Interface AccessCodeService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccessCodeServiceImpl

    public interface AccessCodeService
    Interface for managing access codes
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Creates and saves new access code with the given value, owner and description.

    • Method Detail

      • createNewAccessCode

        void createNewAccessCode(String newAccessCodeValue,
                         String newAccessCodeOwner,
                         String newAccessCodeDescription)
        Creates and saves new access code with the given value, owner and description.
        Parameters:
        newAccessCodeValue - The String containing the value of the access code
        newAccessCodeOwner - The String containing the owner of the access code
        newAccessCodeDescription - The String containing the description of the access code

      • isAccessCodeUnique

        boolean isAccessCodeUnique(String accessCodeValue)
        Returns TRUE is access code is unique
        Parameters:
        accessCodeValue - The String containing the value of the access code
        Returns:
        A boolean representing the result

      • getAccessCodes

        List<AccessCode> getAccessCodes()
        Returns the list of all AccessCodes
        Returns:
        A List<AccessCode> representing the list of all access codes

      • getAccessCode

        AccessCode getAccessCode(int accessCodeId)
        Return AccessCode with given id
        Parameters:
        accessCodeId - The int containing the id of the access code
        Returns:
        An AccessCode representing the access code with given id

      • updateAccessCode

        void updateAccessCode(String accessCodeId,
                      String accessCodeValue,
                      String accessCodeDate,
                      boolean accessCodeIsActive,
                      String accessCodeDescription,
                      String accessCodeOwner)
               throws ParseException
        Updates AccessCode with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        accessCodeId - The String containing the id of the access code
        accessCodeValue - The String containing the value of the access code
        accessCodeDate - The String containing the date of added of the access code
        accessCodeIsActive - The boolean containing the isActive status of the access code
        accessCodeDescription - The String containing the description of the access code
        accessCodeOwner - The String containing the owner of the access code
        Throws:
        ParseException - A ParseException is thrown when the String Date can't be parsed to Date object.

      • isAccessCodeCorrect

        boolean isAccessCodeCorrect(String accessCodeValue)
        Returns TRUE is access code is correct
        Parameters:
        accessCodeValue - The String containing the value of the access code
        Returns:
        A boolean representing the result
